metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4881 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - high
metadata.Description:
** REJECT ** CVE-2023-4881 was wrongly assigned to a bug that was deemed tobe a non-security issue by the Linux kernel security team.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-4881` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-219-generic - 4.15.0-219.230
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-219-generic - 4.15.0-219.230
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-219-lowlatency - 4.15.0-219.230
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-165-generic - 5.4.0-165.182~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-165-lowlatency - 5.4.0-165.182~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-1146-kvm - 4.15.0-1146.151
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1162-aws - 4.15.0-1162.175
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1112-aws - 5.4.0-1112.121~18.04.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1171-azure - 4.15.0-1171.186
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1118-azure - 5.4.0-1118.125~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1156-gcp - 4.15.0-1156.173
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1107-gcp - 5.4.0-1116.125~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1059-ibm - 5.4.0-1059.64~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1111-oracle - 5.4.0-1111.120~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-5.4.0-1088-raspi - 5.4.0-1096.107~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-219.230').
